document.full_text: ollie hayes does not usually bother to open his pub in the sleepy irish village of moneygall on a monday afternoon, but he will make an exception for barack obama.
document.title: sleepy irish village braces for obama homecoming
lines_and_colors: ollie hayes does not usually bother to open his pub in the sleepy irish village of moneygall on a monday afternoon, but he will make an exception for barack obama.
